TopicTitle: How to Fly Two Crafts at Once ( Lazor System & Discussion )

Articles.Content:
Alot of people like me really want to fly multiple crafts at once And since multiplayer is still not acceptable,the only way is lazor system,A SUPERB COMPLEX MOD!

No,all it takes is practice and good observation.I have never seen anyone post this before ( Not Sure )

I present you the noobs guide to multi-flight

HOW TO

1.First make sure your craft (both) have Red Guided Laser and of course a lazor system

2.Launch the amount of crafts you want ( Starters two )

3.set the other craft as target and then activate Lazor System

4.In the first menu,click on the blue bar then click the connect button

5.TADA! You have it! now it is really difficult when it comes to flying so I suggest you guys keep posting your own discoveries!
